title: Fireman Rain
description: Fireman RainRain Fields has been dreaming about, becoming a fireman one day.He was only two years old; he visited a real life fire station.All the fire fighters at the Knoxville Fire Departments were really nice to Rain.And he sees how hard, each of these amazing fire fighters work to keep his community safe.This children's book is dedicated to every fireman in every city.Thanks for all your sacrifice and risking your life to save others every day.Future Fireman Rainhttps://www.facebook.com/profile.php?...
author: Rain Fields
